::FireBlade::
FireBlade smiled as he found his cut affecting hte bot...then frowned
as the teeth bit deep into his arm mech fluid seeping out.  AS the
head pulled back he respectivly pulled back. This bot was
strong....but so was FireBlade.  AS he pulled he could feel his arm
begin to comeo ut of place he had to do something fast. Not being able
to use his gun arm and his other arm slashing once more at the tail
all it left was his SGL. His shoulder mounted grenade launcher pumped
out a liquid fire grenade towards the mid section of the beast.

--- In nbwrpg@y..., "Megan Solmonson" <tmrattrap@h...> wrote:
>
> * Mech fluid gushed from a deep cut in IRs tail, left by FireBlades
swipe.
> She roared but then bit down onto the forearm of FireBlade, or what
bit of
> it was in her mouth.
> She reared her head back then, intent on ripping it clean from his
body,
> while her taile swept away from the burning sword.*
>
